text: Motion
Okay, I'm returning the key and heading out.

Good work.
Thanks.

By the way, it's starting to rain.
Does Asahi have an umbrella?

Oh, is that so?
I didn't bring an umbrella.
I see. Well, there's a spare umbrella here...

I'll be fine.
I can just run really fast and not get too wet.

No, no. It'd be troublesome if you caught a cold,
wouldn't it? It's dangerous to run in the rain, too...
Hmm...
Managing your health is also part of being an idol.
...Understood.

Oh, and instead of that vinyl umbrella,
please use this one.

The one you're holding has a broken frame,
so I'm planning to dispose of it.
Hmm... dispose of it...

Can I have that one too if you're
just going to throw it away?
Sure, but it's just junk, you know...?
Yeah, I want that too. Well then, see you!
(Did Asahi make it home okay?)
(What will they do with the broken umbrellas?)

Ah...
Asahi!

Producer-san!
Did you come?
This is the broken umbrella, right?
Yes, I'm using it properly.
So, what are you doing turning the umbrella upside down?
I'm collecting rainwater.
...What?

I finally collected this much.
It doesn't fill up easily, huh~
Indeed.

Kind of...
mesmerizing, isn't it?
Yes.

It would be even more interesting if
you used a colored vinyl umbrella.
Haha, it would be beautiful.

But... it would be nice if it filled up more.
Should I bring water from somewhere?

No,
that's cheating.
Haha, I guess so...

What will you do with the collected
rainwater in the end?

In the end... What will I do...?
I hadn't thought about it...

I know!
Let's just pour it out and make it rain again!
Like this...
Ahh...!

...The umbrella got all floppy.
Balancing it is difficult...
I'll try one more time~
